description: Copy this file to ~/.config/softether-zig/config.json and edit as needed
notes: Generate password hash with: ./zig-out/bin/vpnclient --gen-hash username password
Environment variables override this config file
Set password_hash to null to use password (not recommended)
ip_version can be: auto, ipv4, ipv6, dual
max_connection: 0 = server policy, 1-32 = force specific count
udp_acceleration: false = TCP-only (stable, default), true = UDP+TCP (experimental)
mac_address: null (default) = Generate random MAC once and cache it
mac_address: 'random' = Generate new random MAC on every connection
randomize_mac: true = Always generate new MAC (privacy mode, like smartphones)
All fields are optional - CLI args and env vars will be used as fallback
